title: Practical Project for Producing Spanish Subtitles and Audio Commentary

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate or higher proficiency in Spanish, basic translation skills
context.additional_context: Course for pre-service teachers to acquire skills in producing subtitles and audio commentary applicable to real educational settings

learning_goals: Learners can produce at least three subtitles reflecting cultural contexts for Spanish-language video content.
Learners can write at least two audio description scripts considering accessibility for visually impaired audiences.
Learners can revise subtitle and audio description project outcomes based on peer feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
